website_summaries.verdict: Ruffled edge gives a classic, decorative look to your bed pillows. Not recommended with overstuffed pillows; they will not fit.
pros: Made from wrinkle-free cotton and polyester blend
Comes in standard, queen, king and European size
Comes in a variety of colors
cons: This price is for a single sham
Not recommended for use with overstuffed pillows

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted the frilly pillows to match the comforter I just ordered from pottery barn, however since they were just for looks I didn’t want to spend so much on them, luckily came across these (still waiting on comforter) but I love them! Exactly what I wanted, no stains, or rips as others said they had. I ordered 3 standard sizes in white (if you want to decorate for cheap, target has standard pillows for $3.50 that fit these perfectly!)
customer_reviews.author: C Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Nices looking ruffles.
customer_reviews.text: I have a very high headboard and needed to break it up some. I found these sham, after looking for days on end, the material is excellent, the ruffles are gathered beautifully, and look more expensive than they were. I purchased the gold and would like another softer color like Seafoam Green or a soft bright Aqua, even a beautiful sunshine yellow. The colors remaining are very muted. These are super shams!! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Definitely NOT wrinkle free. It's supposed to be for queen pillows, but it's much larger. And WHO sells ONE pillowcase?! For $17 at that?! It's definitely not worth the price. I'm sending it back. Maybe you want to spend $30-something on pillowcases, but I don't. That's ridiculous. Not satisfied and wouldn't recommend it to someone I DON'T like, let alone someone I do like. Oh... And the material is see-through. I have Beauty Rest pillows, and you can see the wording through the pillowcase.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn O

customer_reviews.title: Covers king pillow but not soft
customer_reviews.text: It serves the purpose of keeping dog & cat fur off my pillow but it’s a very basic sham with ruffles that I wanted Hv washed it twice & dried with fabric sheet but still seems rough but it was cheap so what was I expecting?
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Perfection, Beauty and Quality at it's Finest!!
customer_reviews.text: The pillow shams match the bed skirts perfectly!! These 2 items match the H.Versailtex drapes perfectly. Excellent colors, quality, sizes, style and fashion. I love their products. I've used their products redecorating 4 bedrooms already. Totally beautiful and I'm more than totally satisfied!!! (Update:10-16-2020) I have ordered several other sets, in several different colors and they matched the dust ruffles perfectly. They also matched the comforters and drapes. Everything was comfortable, soft and beautiful. They have Great Customer service also.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki M.

customer_reviews.title: Great ruffled pillow!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit! Came on time but had to order two different times. Didn’t realize I was only ordering one. Why don’t they package 2 together? Other than that, the color matched a throw pillow I had and I’m happy!
customer_reviews.author: Maren313

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful,  well made, quality pillow sham!
customer_reviews.text: My pillow sham just came and it is beautiful! And extremely well made! I bought it for my new "mypillow " and it fits perfectly. I cant wait to sleep on it tonight for the 1st time! Thank you for this quality item and so worth the price.. I paid double that at Walmart for a sham that is not nearly as nice and durable. Super Fast delivery too!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Great for the purpose I needed them for. However they are cheaply made, I panicked at first because even though they came together in the same box... they had different packaging. Weird. But it worked for the spare bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Pretty thin, if the pillow you are using has ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty thin, if the pillow you are using has a printed/patterned manufacturer cover at all - it will definitely show. The ruffled edge is also not near as full as shown in the picture, but I am ok with that. Other than that, it's perfect
customer_reviews.author: LBSTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Ruffles flop over
customer_reviews.text: The ruffles flop over super easily, the case doesn't fit snugly around my fluffiest pillows. Kind of frustrating because it really is a pretty yet simple sham
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Love these ruffled pillow shams!
customer_reviews.text: Matched perfectly with my ruffle comforter set! Great quality and has a nice cotton fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: These shams are not nearly as nice as they appear. The fabric is very thin, the ruffles are poorly sewn. They are certainly not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: AnnB

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Nicer than expected. Washer / dryer good. Got a print queen quilt (from amazon) but didn’t have option for king shams - it came w standard shams. But I like extra pillows. So these worked just perfect. Color was very accurate and blended nicely with quilt
customer_reviews.author: R BTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Sham is nice quality
customer_reviews.text: The color is lighter than shown, using to lay over an ottoman for my Shih-tzu. Sham is made well, ruffle is even and the material is nice,

customer_reviews.title: Great fast service!
customer_reviews.text: Love the pillow shams. Fast delivery, nice quality, smooth silky fabric, colormatches my new quilt/bedspread exactly! Thanks!

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this pillow sham! Good quality, beautiful colors, slight sheen and very soft. Available colors. Are nice too. The ruffle is full and tight, not flimsy. I will buy more!

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality pillow sham
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality pillow sham. I only wanted one and I like the ruffle.

customer_reviews.title: Pink Ruffled Sham

Cheaper than buying a whole new set and I really like the one I have (just can't find one of the ruffled shams).

product_meta.title: ShopBedding Ruffle Pillow case - Queen Pillow sham (White), Ruffle Pillow Cover.
feature_bullets: DURABLE PILLOW SHAM, HIGH QUALITY CONSTRUCTION - Harmony Lane Pillow Shams are made of highest quality fabric, designed to last. Made from a soft cotton/polyester blend fabric, this pillow sham is wrinkle free and fade resistant.

ELEGANT DESIGN - Create a stylish look in your bedroom with our classic ruffled pillow sham. The Harmony Lane Pillow Sham matches to our Harmony Lane Ruffled Bed Skirts. Make sure to buy them both to make your bed a finished look.

MULTI COLOR OPTION - We offer a variety of colors for you to choose. Choose the color you like and match your room. Choose from black, bone, brown, burgundy, camel, gold, grape, hunter, blue, navy, pink, rose, sage, seafoam, and white pillow shams.
EASY TO CLEAN PILLOW SHAMS - Care instructions: Machine wash cold, gentle cycle, only non chlorine bleach when needed, tumble dry at low temperature, cool iron if needed.
RISK FREE SHOPPING - 100% satisfaction or your money back. No questions asked!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars483 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
